body.name: Cuisinart EM-100 1000-Watt 15-Bar Espresso Maker, Stainless Steel (Renewed)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 23 hrs 35 mins.
features: Exceptional Espresso at Home: With the Cuisinart EM-100, you can achieve professional, barista-level espresso. Featuring a powerful 15 bar pressure system, it's ideal for brewing rich, full-flavored coffee, making it a perfect match for espresso enthusiasts and those who appreciate a robust cup.

Versatile Brewing Options: This espresso maker is designed for convenience and versatility. Whether you prefer ground espresso or pods, the Cuisinart EM-100 can handle both, brewing either one or two cups at a time. It's an excellent choice for households with diverse coffee preferences.

Sophisticated Design with Superior Functionality: The Cuisinart EM-100 is not only about performance but also elegance. Its professional-grade stainless steel housing adds a touch of sophistication to any kitchen. The steam nozzle and frothing cup make it easy to create luscious lattes and creamy cappuccinos right at home.

User-Friendly Features for Easy Operation: Designed with the user in mind, the Cuisinart EM-100 includes a portafilter holder with a locking mechanism for easy disposal of grounds, a removable drip tray for simple cleaning, and a warming tray to keep your cups ready for serving the perfect espresso or cappuccino.

Large Capacity Meets Compact Efficiency: The Cuisinart EM-100 is designed for efficiency and convenience. It features a large 53-ounce water reservoir, reducing the need for frequent refills, and its compact design ensures it fits comfortably in any kitchen, making it an ideal choice for espresso and coffee enthusiasts alike.
body.description: Cuisinart EM-100 1000-Watt 15-Bar Espresso Maker, Stainless Steel (Certified Refurbished)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is such a cool machine! It's easy to use and makes great ...
reviews.reviewText: This is such a cool machine! It's easy to use and makes great coffee!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Works well but no slide holder
reviews.reviewText: I''m generally very happy with this espresso maker. The only problem is that there is no slide lock to keep the filter basket in place when emptying the used coffee grounds. The filter basket falls into my waste basket The instructions says use the "slide lock". There is no slide lock. I called Cuisinart customer service and confirmed that there is no slide lock.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 21, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Beware of the refurbs.
reviews.reviewText: Bought a refurb and the area around the filter holder wouldn't seal so grounds would leak out from the outside of the body where the filter holder engages so it was more than just the filter holder not sealing. Tried a bunch of different grinds leaked every time. The filter holder also sat a little loose. Not sure how much of this is due to the refurb and how much can be attributed to overall poor quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: All the bells and whistles! My adult kids love this!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 14, 2016
reviews.reviewText: It shipped broken.... twice, 3rd shipment was directly from the manufacturer. Makes a really loud noise!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quiet and powerful
reviews.reviewText: I am a long time latte drinker and have many machines over the years. This one is great. Easy to use, quiet which is a huge plus and the steamer heat the milk up quickly and I have a perfect latte in no time. Couldn't be happier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2018
reviews.reviewText: I love mornings now! Easy to use, very quickly, perfect cappuccino! Only one thing - it leaks when use two-spoon nozzle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 4, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars excellent quality, great ease of use
reviews.reviewText: as expected, excellent quality, great ease of use. I would buy again
